runs.comm: pitched up and angling away just a shade outside off, ignored. Hider draws some cheer from the crowd
Hamilton takes a step out of the crease, shuffles across off, this is pushed too full. He can't lay bat on the flick, off the pad and sneaks away to short fine leg
Sibanda almost bullies the debutant!  He runs down the pitch and slices it over the covers. Not middled, but the intent was there
pitched up full on off, Sibanda drills a drive to mid-off. Zim pinch another run via an overthrow. Mashrafe isn't pleased
length on middle, tapped in front of short cover. Sibanda is eager for a quick single, but is sent back
full and straight, the batsman targets the leg side with a flick and ends up poking it feebly to the covers off a soft leading edge
pitched up and wobbles away outside off, leaving Hamilton defensively stabbing and missing
shortish and outside off, Hamilton jabs it to the covers
Hamilton steps away outside leg, this is dropped fractionally short again. Slapped back to the bowler
length and just outside off, no swing. Hamilton frees his arms and lofts it down the ground with authority
back of a length and outside off, Hamilton throws his hands at it. He can only hack it to mid-off
Hamilton likes the paddle. But he can't connect it now. Full and outside off, sweep and a miss
pitched up on middle, this one held up in the wicket. Chipped in front of mid-on
full on the leg stump, Sibanda snaps his wrists, as he picks up and deposits over midwicket
pushed too full and outside off, Sibanda lays into it... He smashes this half-volley over mid-off for a flat six
four, six, four! Dug in short and on off, Sibanda waited for it, pulling it firmly to the midwicket boundary
Sibanda continues to bully Hider! Mid-off dives to his right; Mashrafe dives over the ball. Low full toss on off, driven  past the Bangladesh captain
pitched up on off and middle, catches the batsman in a tangle. Tickled towards the keeper who is up to the stumps
Hamilton makes room in a bid to throw the bowler off the course. Off-side wide
too full and outside off, drilled past the covers. I guess that was the slower one. Saikat chases hard in vain
back of a length and outside off, cracked away through point on the back foot
wide line outside off, Hamilton throws his hands at it, gets a bottom edge that nutmegs Nurul. Shahid has a wry smile
it's all finesse now. Length and outside off, Hamilton allows the ball to come to him, threads the gap, beats the two men behind point. Finds the third-man boundary

Maiden wicket for Shahid in T20Is. He breaks through. Full and wide outside off, Hamilton plays away from the body. He slaps it, but the point fielder goes to his right and snaps it up. Hamilton drops to his knees. The debutants - Shahid and Mosaddek - combine for the first wicket
crunchy! Width outside off, flayed away behind point for four more. Short third man had no chance
back of a length and outside off, Sibanda makes room and jabs it back to Ali
chopped from off stump to short third man. Fastest fifty for Zimbabwe in T20Is
full and outside off, flash and a miss. Nurul was excited there. The batsman was beaten by seam movement off the deck
might have been a slower ball on off, dropped in front of point
Mutumbami dances out, checks his push and bunts it to cover for one
back of a length on off, flicked behind square for one
Mashrafe pulls pace off this one outside off, flash and miss

big mix-up, but the pair complete a single. The throw was off-radar from the mid-off fielder. Nurul, the keeper is down. He did well to gather the ball, but could not back-flick it back onto the stumps, a la Dhoni. The batsman danced out, Mashrafe dragged it short, check-pushed past the diving bowler
short and wide outside off, cut away through point
'keeper, keeper is the cry', but the fielder fumbles. Jabbed towards mid-off after beating the diving short-cover fielder
short and outside off, he throws his hands at a cut, and chops it to the covers
flighted and drifts in, blocked
chopped from outside off to the covers
looped up and outside off, smeared over the covers. Mutumbami went deep in the crease and swung it away
this one slides on, slogged to long-on
full and outside off, driven to long-off

drifts in on off, clipped through square leg. The pair push for two. They get more eventually. Wild, wild throw, Shahid the culprit. Nerves? The ball is way wide of Nurul and runs away to the point boundary
back of a length and outside off, dabbed to point
back of a length, keeps low a bit, punched down the ground, to long-on
short ball on middle, Mashrafe does not have much pace to pose a threat. Mutumbami skips back and pulls over backward square leg
Mutumbami shuffles outside leg, Mashrafe chases the batsman. Poked back to the bowler
back of a length, sticks in the pitch, and stops on off, chopped to cover
flicked from off stump through backward square leg
Mutumbami skipped out, Shakib held this back outside off. Reaches out and nudges it to point
flat on off, Mutumbami hunts for a big shot and holes out. He goes low and slog-sweeps it into the hands of Sabbir at deep midwicket. 400th international wicket for Shakib
Williams stretches forward and eases a single down the ground
drifts in on middle, leading-edged in front of cover
down the track and driven to short cover, diving save from the fielder
fractionally short on off, cut strongly to deep cover on the back foot
a touch short on middle, pulled to cow corner
picked away off the pads to backward square
lashed down the ground to long-off, as this was fired outside off
squirted through midwicket off an inside edge
another short ball, outside off, slapped back to Saikat
skiddy ball on the pads, tucked to deep midwicket
drifts in on middle, played back to Shakib
arm-ball, snakes in, too full. Dug out
clipped off the pads to deep square leg
worked around the corner for one more
dug in short on middle, Sibanda rocks back. He does not connect properly with a pull. Skews it off the bottom of the bat to Sabbir at deep midwicket... Shakib has put the skids on Zim
this one grips in the surface and turns away, poked to the off side for one
offbreak outside off, pushed past point
knocked down the ground, to long-on
slides on outside off, punched on the back foot to Shahid at sweeper cover
another hurrying ball, played back to Saikat
the batsman sets up for a reverse-sweep, he may have deflected it onto his pads off the glove. Umpire Anisur did not spot the glove. Given as leg bye, impact outside the line though

whipped through square leg. Waller sprints back for the second, the fielder throws it to the keeper. Nurul comes in front of the stumps, back-flicks it to disturb the furniture. A bit of Dhoni there in Nurul again. But Waller was in
full on the stumps, driven to cover, where Mashrafe makes a tumbling stop to his right. Nurul runs to his captain and pats him
rising ball outside off, the left-hander rides it to point
a tad overpitched and outside off, Waller crunches a drive past the covers, beats sweeper cover to his right; first four since the rain break?
looks like a cutter, angled to point
back of a length, dragged behind off an inside edge. That wasn't far away from the off stump
slower one outside off, Williams is beaten
full and on middle, Waller laces it inside out over the covers. He sends it skimming to the boundary
Ali shortens his length outside off, punched to backward point, a fumble gives a single
width outside off as the bowler rolls his fingers across it, cut to backward point
full on off and middle, pushed to long-on
full on middle, smartly chipped over the bowler's head
picked off the pads to deep square leg
down the track, Mahmudullah drops it short. Slugged to long-on
shorter and down leg, beaten on the pull. Nurul is beaten as well. Wide
tossed up and outside off, Waller smacks it over deep midwicket with a slog-sweep
straight ball, pushed through the covers
dropped at point. Mosaddek was the fielder. Flat and outside off, top-edged cut, the fielder dives forward. He was late to do that, shells the catch, and lets it through him
tapped into cover with a slight open face
ouch, the wide hurts Bangladesh. Slammed from outside off to the midwicket boundary
what a shot... Pitched too full and outside off, may have been a slower ball. Waller goes low and welcomes Shahid back with a delicious six over sweeper cover
full and outside off, thrashed to wide long-off for two
full and outside off, flayed to long-on
Waller ventures wide of the crease and pushes full and outside off, swung to long-off
Waller hangs back and cuts a single to the off-side sweeper. This was pitched short and outside off
back of a length, extra bounce outside off, beats the batsman
full and outside off, the skied hit does not carry to long-off
Waller shuffles across off, the bowler follows him with a short one. Pulled... or rather flapped to the left of square leg
full and outside off, Williams ventures across off, scooping it over short fine leg
full and wide outside off, mis-hit drive to mid-off for one
length and outside off, Waller dances out and sends it clattering over the covers for a six
Waller steps outside leg, Mashrafe follows him with a yorker. Jammed out for one
Waller moves across off, slog-sweeping a full one to deep midwicket
down the track, takes it on the full, and drives it back to Shakib
yorker on off, jabbed to square leg
round-armish ball on middle, slogged over wide long-on for another six
flat and fired on the leg stump, Waller powers another slog-sweep, this time he holes out to Soumya at deep midwicket. No fifty for Waller, but he has given his side the boost at the death
quicker from Shakib again, slog-swept powerfully over deep midwicket
pitched up on off, slower ball. Poked back to the bowler
Raza takes over from Waller. He shuffles across off and ramps it over short fine leg
back of a length and outside off, bottom-edged cut back to the bowler
yorker, right in the blockhole on middle, driven to long-on
shorter and outside off, chopped to point off the toe end

full on off, driven sweetly to long-on. They go for the second, Mosaddek fires an accurate throw at the bowler's end. Mashrafe wasn't able to gather the ball. He takes the bails off without collecting the ball
blockhole ball on middle, Williams misses the leg-side flick. He is rapped plumb in front. First wicket for Hider, after a pasting early on
slapped down the ground, forces the umpire to duck for cover.
dug in shortish and outside off, Moor launches a pull over midwicket
Shahid almost pulls off a one-handed catch! He flies to his left at backward point, but the ball pops out. Moor slices a full toss

full toss, that should have been smashed for six. Instead, Raza holes out to long-on. Was that over the waistline? That's okay. Raza has to go. Sabbir takes another catch, his third. Why din't he bowl today?
yorker length on off, dragged towards midwicket
